section.title: Description
section.p: This section identifies the living arrangements for a client/patient. class may have overlaps with FamilySocialHistoryArea so this may go away.

stentry.p: The value sets for this attribute are based on the HL7 Living Arrangements coding system (2.16.840.1.113883.5.63) used to specify whether the patient is homeless, transient, living in a community shelter, or institutionalized.
